text: Ra talakaprapta svasni manisale aphula'i tina pataka rajasvalasam'ma rokirakhun. Tiniharuka lagi yo ijajata chaina ki je tinako garbhama allahale srsti gareko cha tyasala'i luka'un yadi tiniharula'i allaha ra kayamatako dinamathi astha cha ra tinaka patiharu yasa avadhima tinala'i pharka'una cahanchan bhane tiniharule tinala'i aphno patnitvama phirta lina pura hakadara chan, yadi uniharu samajhadari garna cahanchan. Ra, niyamanusara svasnila'i purusaharumathi adhikara ustai cha jasto purusaharula'i svasniharumathi cha. Ra, allaha sarvasaktimana ra sarvajnana sampanna cha
